title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories on the x axis representing Race, and Number of missing persons in each Race on the y axis.
White is higher than any other categories with value 359768.0, followed by Black, and Unknown. Down to category Indian with the lowest value of 10447.0.
The highest value at White is almost 34.44 times larger than the minimum value of Indian.
